message:
Oracle Cloud Builder Summit
Fast-Track Your Enterprise to the Cloud
story: Islam Abo-Amra shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Oracle Cloud Forum
caption: oracle.com
description: Cloud computing is transforming IT. No longer an emerging technology, organizations are adopting cloud to more quickly respond to business needs, lower costs, and take advantage of new innovations. The benefits are clear and compelling. Now is the time for informed decisions.
